column1: This table shows all the ATOM-ATOM interactions of the interacting Bases from the 13 families of the Isostericity Matrices.  I have designated the oxygen on the sugar as O2* and the hydrogen on that oxygen as H2*.  All other ATOM designations come from the Sponer file.
